item.title: Python 3.9's TopologicalSorter
item.description: Introduction New to Python 3.9 is the graphlib module and its TopologicalSorter. Appearing somewhat out of place in the standard library at the moment, I’ll introduce topological sorting generally. I’ll also demonstrate how Python’s new TopologicalSorter works.
